query: SELECT id, platform, handle, LEFT(content, 100) as content_preview, LEFT(contentZh, 100) as contentZh_preview, createdAt, updatedAt FROM social_media_cache WHERE platform = 'truthsocial' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2XUL6yzk1hX49rR.root --database 79BApBFg8fLtwjChCNUTDR --execute SELECT id, platform, handle, LEFT(content, 100) as content_preview, LEFT(contentZh, 100) as contentZh_preview, createdAt, updatedAt FROM social_media_cache WHERE platform = 'truthsocial' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 5;
